scripts.migrate:learningElements: ENV=development doppler run --config dev -- ts-node -r dotenv/config --esm --experimental-specifier-resolution=node src/scripts/migrateLearningElements.ts
scripts.migrate:learningElements:prod: ENV=development doppler run --config prd -- ts-node -r dotenv/config --esm --experimental-specifier-resolution=node src/scripts/migrateLearningElements.ts
scripts.prisma:migrate: doppler run --config dev -- prisma migrate dev --schema=src/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.prisma:migrate:create: doppler run --config dev -- prisma migrate dev --schema=src/prisma/schema.prisma --create-only
scripts.prisma:deploy: doppler run --config dev -- npm run prisma:deploy:raw
scripts.prisma:deploy:qa: doppler run --config stg -- npm run prisma:deploy:raw
scripts.prisma:deploy:prod: doppler run --config prd -- npm run prisma:deploy:raw
scripts.prisma:resolve:prod: doppler run --config prd -- prisma migrate resolve --schema=src/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.prisma:push: doppler run --config dev -- npm run prisma:push:raw
scripts.prisma:push:qa: doppler run --config stg -- npm run prisma:push:raw
scripts.prisma:reset: doppler run --config dev -- npm run prisma:reset:raw
scripts.prisma:reset:seed: doppler run --config dev -- prisma migrate reset --schema=src/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.prisma:reset:qa: doppler run --config stg -- npm run prisma:reset:raw
scripts.prisma:studio: doppler run --config dev -- npm run prisma:studio:raw
scripts.prisma:studio:qa: doppler run --config stg -- npm run prisma:studio:raw
scripts.prisma:studio:prod: doppler run --config prd -- npm run prisma:studio:raw
scripts.seed: ENV=development doppler run --config dev -- npm-run-all seed:test
scripts.seed:achievements: ENV=development doppler run --config dev -- ts-node --esm --experimental-specifier-resolution=node src/data/seedAchievements.ts
scripts.seed:importQuestions: cp ../../legacy/db/exported_questions.json ./src/data/exported_questions.json && ENV=development doppler run --config dev -- ts-node --esm --experimental-specifier-resolution=node src/data/importQuestions.ts
scripts.seed:qa: ENV=development doppler run --config stg -- npm-run-all seed:qa:test
scripts.seed:qa:bf1: ENV=development doppler run --config stg -- ts-node -r dotenv/config --esm --experimental-specifier-resolution=node src/data/seedBF1.ts
scripts.seed:prod: ENV=production doppler run --config prd -- npm-run-all seed:prod:bf1 seed:prod:ami
scripts.seed:prod:bf1: ENV=development doppler run --config prd -- ts-node -r dotenv/config --esm --experimental-specifier-resolution=node src/data/seedBF1.ts
scripts.seed:prod:bf2: ENV=development doppler run --config prd -- ts-node -r dotenv/config --esm --experimental-specifier-resolution=node src/data/seedBF2.ts
scripts.seed:prod:achievements: ENV=production doppler run --config prd -- ts-node --esm --experimental-specifier-resolution=node src/data/seedAchievements.ts
scripts.seed:prod:summerSchool: ENV=production doppler run --config prd -- ts-node --esm --experimental-specifier-resolution=node src/data/seedSummerSchool.ts
scripts.seed:prod:user: ENV=production doppler run --config prd -- ts-node --esm --experimental-specifier-resolution=node src/data/seedUser.ts
scripts.seed:prod:levels: ENV=production doppler run --config prd -- ts-node --esm --experimental-specifier-resolution=node src/data/seedLevels.ts
scripts.seed:prod:importQuestions: cp ../../legacy/db/exported_questions.json ./src/data/exported_questions.json && ENV=development doppler run --config prd -- ts-node --esm --experimental-specifier-resolution=node src/data/importQuestions.ts
scripts.seed:mockExamPoints: ENV=production doppler run --config prd -- ts-node -r dotenv/config --esm --experimental-specifier-resolution=node src/scripts/parseMockExamPoints.ts
